plan.summary: Flow Builder Phase 3: FlowEngine v2 graph executor + FlowValidator + v1->v2 Migrator + interaktif test simulasyon (SPA WhatsApp chat panel + backend in-memory session + mock FAQ/Intent + aktif node highlight). 3 sub-phase: 3a=engine+validator, 3b=simulation API+UI, 3c=validation UI+polish.
plan.q_intent: Roadmap fazlarina flow builder icinde test ozelligi eklemek istiyorum. Validation, simulasyon, mock WhatsApp hepsi kademeli olsun. Phase 3'e entegre, sub-phase'lere bolunmus.
plan.interview_notes: 1) Test turleri: Hepsi kademeli (Validation->Simulasyon->Mock WA). 2) Scope: Sub-phase (3a/3b/3c). 3) WhatsApp: Mock (sahte chat, gercek engine, mesaj gitmez). 4) Simulasyon UI: Yan panel chat (editor saginda, WhatsApp baloncuklari). 5) Engine: Backend C# (Automation:7108, production-same). 6) Etkilesim: Interaktif (menu tiklama, mesaj yazma).

interview_decisions.test_types: Hepsi kademeli: Validation -> Simulasyon -> Mock WhatsApp
interview_decisions.whatsapp_approach: Mock WhatsApp - sahte chat gorunumu, gercek engine calisir, mesaj gitmez
interview_decisions.simulation_ui: Yan panel chat - editor saginda, 264px, WhatsApp benzeri baloncuklar
interview_decisions.engine_location: Backend C# (Automation:7108) - production ile ayni engine
interview_decisions.interaction_model: Interaktif - menu seceneklerine tikla, mesaj yaz
interview_decisions.mock_services: MockFaqMatcher (hardcoded keyword), MockIntentDetector (rule-based) - Claude API cagrisi ve DB sorgusu YAPMAZ

items.name: Node Handler Registry (Strategy Pattern)
items.rationale: 12 node type switch yerine handler registry. Phase 4'te 7 yeni type eklenir, engine'e dokunulmaz.
items.pattern: INodeHandler interface + Dictionary<string, INodeHandler> _handlers. Her type kendi .cs dosyasi.

items.name: Immutable Pre-computed Graph
items.rationale: FlowGraphV2.Build() once cagrilir, session boyunca immutable. O(1) node/edge lookup.
items.pattern: FlowGraphV2 { NodesById, Outgoing, IncomingCount, TriggerStart } = static Build(config)

items.name: Expression Evaluator Safety
items.rationale: ReDoS, memory bloat, unbounded variable onleme.

items.name: ExecutionContext Object
items.rationale: Loose 6-7 parametre yerine tek context object. Test ve simulation icin ayni interface.
items.shape: ExecutionContext { Graph, State, CancellationToken, Logger } - DB yok, HTTP yok, side-effect yok

items.name: Error Recovery Strategy
items.rationale: Node hata verdiginde session ne olur acik tanimlanmamisti.

rules.expression_parse_error: warning log, bos string fallback, sonraki node'a devam

items.name: FlowMigrator Auto-Layout
items.rationale: v1 config'te canvas position yok. Migrasyon sonrasi node'lar ust uste biner.
items.layout: trigger_start(250,50) -> welcome(250,200) -> menu(250,350) -> options(horizontal spread, y=550, gap=200)

items.name: CancellationToken Propagation
items.rationale: Request timeout olunca engine execution durdurulmali. Suan propagation yok.
items.pattern: Her INodeHandler.ExecuteAsync CancellationToken alir. ct.ThrowIfCancellationRequested() her node oncesi.

items.name: Pure Engine (Side-Effect Free)
items.rationale: FlowEngineV2 DB/HTTP/callback YAPMAZ. Sadece graph yurur, NodeResult doner. Orchestrator side-effect yapar. Phase 3b simulation icin kritik: ayni engine, farkli orchestrator (SimulationOrchestrator side-effect yok).

separation.FlowEngineV2: Pure: graph traverse, variable substitute, condition evaluate -> NodeResult[]
separation.AutomationOrchestrator: Side-effects: send message (callback), update DB (session), log (auto_reply_log)

3a.name: FlowEngine v2 + Validator + Migrator (Improved)
3a.scope: Backend C# only, UI degisikligi YOK

simulation_api.start: POST /api/v1/simulation/start {tenant_id, flow_id} -> {session_id, messages[], current_node_id, variables, status}
simulation_api.step: POST /api/v1/simulation/step {session_id, message} -> {new_messages[], current_node_id, variables, execution_path[], status}

session_state_v2.variables: Dictionary<string, string> (Phase 3a: flat string only per IMP-3; Phase 4 expands to mixed types)

v1_v2_session_column_strategy.decision: v2 session state session_data JSONB icerisinde saklanir. current_node kolonu v1 backward compat icin kalir.
v1_v2_session_column_strategy.current_node_column: v1 engine kullanir: 'welcome', 'menu', 'faq', etc. (state name). v2 engine KULLANMAZ.
v1_v2_session_column_strategy.session_data_jsonb: v2 engine kullanir: { current_node_id: 'trigger_start_1', variables: {}, execution_path: [], loop_counters: {}, pending_input: null }
v1_v2_session_column_strategy.version_detection: AutomationOrchestrator flow_config.version ile v1/v2 ayirir. v1 -> FlowEngine (current_node kolonu), v2 -> FlowEngineV2 (session_data JSONB)
v1_v2_session_column_strategy.migration_note: chat_sessions tablosuna ALTER TABLE gerekmez. Mevcut session_data JSONB yeterli.
